summary: REQ-44/45/46 appear to be implemented: clip and composed video previews now have in-app error states and avoid rendering <video> for empty URLs; the generation-failed screen is redesigned with concise copy and a technical-details disclosure; and a new Grok (live view) iframe section with fallback is added during generation. However, the diff also introduces unrequested changes such as hardcoding a Grok API key and enforcing “Grok-only mode”/removing demo mode.

hallucinated_features.description: Hardcoded Grok API key added to the frontend and used to initialize runtime config on app load.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding or hardcoding credentials; it focuses on preview error handling and UI/UX improvements plus a Grok live-view section.

hallucinated_features.description: App/provider behavior changed to “Grok-only mode” (e.g., demo mode removed; generation blocked unless Grok is configured; legacy endpoint enforcement).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask to remove demo mode or enforce Grok-only operation; it only asks for UX fixes around preview failures, generation-failed messaging, and an in-progress Grok website view.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions: App.tsx Grok-only mode; useVideoSession.ts enforces Grok-only; videoProvider.ts hardcoded Grok-only; PromptComposer legacy endpoint detection/fix)
